    • setImpact

      public boolean setImpact​(java.awt.geom.Point2D point, int dir)
      This method is used to detect the impact between the brick and ball
      Overrides:
      setImpact in class Brick
      Parameters:
      point - The position of current ball
      dir - The direction for the ball to bounce
      Returns:
      False if the brick is broken, True if there is a impact between ball and brick
